UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Structure-activity analysis of buforin II, a histone H2A-derived antimicrobial peptide: the proline hinge is responsible for the cell-penetrating ability of buforin II.
Literature.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2000;97:8245-8250
Literature.Author: Park CB, Yi KS, Matsuzaki K, Kim MS, Kim SC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=32µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans(MIC=32µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae(MIC=32µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=32µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=16µg/ml),Serratia marcescens(MIC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas putida(MIC=16µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=16µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans(MIC=16µg/ml),Saccharomyces cerevisiae(MIC=16µg/ml)
